info.name: Deezer Dark
info.description:
First theme, dark and clean for save your eyes, build to the 7th december 2017.
I hope he will be futurproof, I don't really want to change it all time.
It's my first theme and I'm again a beginner, so he isn't really compact 542 lines, I could to optimize it to 250 lines I think, maybe soon.
info.additionalInfo:
I have just add a transparency to the search panel "page-panel" (because I like the transparency) and this panel hide 1/3 from the page...
But if you want to change the opacity (up or down) it's actually to the 349th line !
I have too compacted the menu to the left.
